trans-unit.source: Controls <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> rendering and rafting, and the merging of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Controla a renderização e o reposicionamento de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> e a mesclagem de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> supports <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>-related tasks for entire applications, such as merging, settings, and renderer options.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> dá suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>-relacionadas a tarefas para aplicativos inteiros, como opções de mesclagem, configurações e processador.

trans-unit.source: The overloaded <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> method combines <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls with each other, and the overloaded <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RevertMerge%2A> method undoes a merge operation.
trans-unit.target: Sobrecarregados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> método combina <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles entre si, e o sobrecarregado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RevertMerge%2A> método Desfaz uma operação de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class to gain even more control and customizability over painting and layout style.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> classe para obter mais controle e personalização sobre estilo de pintura e layout.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all the typical scenarios of menu item merging.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra todos os cenários típicos de mesclagem do item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> and some of its members.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra uma chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> e alguns de seus membros.

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> or derived <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> type to find.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que especifica o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> ou do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> derivado a ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Finds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> or a type derived from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Localiza o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> especificado ou um tipo derivado de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> or one of its derived types as specified by the <paramref name="toolStripName" /> parameter, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> ou um de seus tipos derivados, conforme especificado pelo parâmetro <paramref name="toolStripName" /> ou <see langword="null" />, se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> não for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.FindToolStrip%2A> method to search for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or an object derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.FindToolStrip%2A> método para pesquisar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> ou um objeto derivado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Derived types of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Tipos derivados da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> são <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.

trans-unit.source: If the object of the search is not specifically a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> but one of these derived types, cast the return type as required.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto da pesquisa não é especificamente um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> , mas um desses tipos derivados, converter o tipo de retorno conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.FindToolStrip%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um uso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.FindToolStrip%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut key for which to search.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de atalho a ser pesquisado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating whether the specified shortcut key is used by any of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> controls of a form.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um valor que indica se a tecla de atalho especificada é usada por um dos controles <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> de um formulário.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the shortcut key is used by any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> on the form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a tecla de atalho for usada por qualquer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> no formulário; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut key to test for validity.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de atalho a ser testada quanto à validade.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating whether a defined shortcut key is valid.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um valor que indica se uma tecla de atalho definida é válida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the shortcut key is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a tecla de atalho for válida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Valid shortcut keys are the function keys F1 through F12 alone; function keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers; or other keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers.
trans-unit.target: Teclas de atalho válidas são as teclas de função F1 por meio de F12 sozinho; teclas de função com modificadores SHIFT, ALT ou CTRL; ou outras chaves com modificadores CTRL, ALT ou SHIFT.

trans-unit.source: CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT keys and keys other than function keys are not valid shortcut keys if used alone.
trans-unit.target: CTRL, ALT, ou teclas SHIFT e chaves que não seja de teclas de função não são as teclas de atalho válido quando usado sozinho.

trans-unit.source: Loads settings for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
trans-unit.target: Carrega as configurações para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> whose name is also the settings key.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> cujo nome também é a chave de configurações.

trans-unit.source: Loads settings for the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> using the full name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> as the settings key.
trans-unit.target: Carrega as configurações para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> especificado usando o nome completo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> como a chave de configurações.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls that are not on the form at design time when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> settings are saved are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> when the settings are loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles que não estão no formulário no design de hora em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> configurações são salvas são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> quando as configurações são carregadas.

trans-unit.source: To reset the settings, comment out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line and leave the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> line.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir as configurações, comente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> de linha e deixe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> linha.

trans-unit.source: This will not load any settings and will persist the last state.
trans-unit.target: Isso não carregará as configurações e será mantido o último estado.

trans-unit.source: When you remove the comment from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line, those settings will be applied.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover o comentário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> linha, essas configurações serão aplicadas.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="targetForm" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="targetForm" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> for which to load settings.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> para o qual carregar as configurações.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the settings key for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa a chave de configurações para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.

trans-unit.source: Loads settings for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> using the specified settings key.
trans-unit.target: Carrega as configurações para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> especificado usando a chave de configurações especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls that are not on the form at design time when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> settings are saved are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> when the settings are loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles que não estão no formulário no design de hora em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> configurações são salvas são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> quando as configurações são carregadas.

trans-unit.source: To reset the settings, comment out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line and leave the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> line.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir as configurações, comente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> de linha e deixe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> linha.

trans-unit.source: This will not load any settings and will persist the last state.
trans-unit.target: Isso não carregará as configurações e será mantido o último estado.

trans-unit.source: When you remove the comment from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line, those settings will be applied.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover o comentário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> linha, essas configurações serão aplicadas.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" /> ou está vazio.

trans-unit.source: Combines <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Combina controles <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to be combined with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> referred to by the <c>targetName</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> a ser combinado com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> referenciado pelo parâmetro <c>targetName</c>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that receives the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> referred to by the <c>sourceToolStrip</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> que recebe o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> referenciado pelo parâmetro <c>sourceToolStrip</c>.

trans-unit.source: Combines two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects of the same type.
trans-unit.target: Combina dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> do mesmo tipo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the merge is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mesclagem for bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to combine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects of identical type, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects with other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objects with other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objects, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método combinar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> tipo de objetos de idênticos, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos com outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objetos com outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objetos e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to combine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects of different types.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método combinar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos de tipos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, and the source and target types must be identical, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos e os tipos de origem e destino devem ser idênticos ou este método retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on an MDI child form, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: Se houver duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controles em um formulário MDI filho, definindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> para `true` pai formulário mescla o conteúdo de apenas uma o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controles.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> to merge the contents of additional child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> para mesclar o conteúdo de filho adicional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controles no formulário pai MDI.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceToolStrip" /> or <paramref name="targetName" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="sourceToolStrip" /> ou <paramref name="targetName" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceToolStrip" /> or <paramref name="targetName" /> parameters refer to the same <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros <paramref name="sourceToolStrip" /> ou <paramref name="targetName" /> se referem ao mesmo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to be combined with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> referred to by the <c>targetToolStrip</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> a ser combinado com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> referenciado pelo parâmetro <c>targetToolStrip</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that receives the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> referred to by the <c>sourceToolStrip</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> que recebe o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> referenciado pelo parâmetro <c>sourceToolStrip</c>.

trans-unit.source: Combines two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects of different types.
trans-unit.target: Combina dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> de tipos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the merge is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mesclagem for bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to combine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects of different types.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método combinar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos de tipos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to combine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects of identical type, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects with other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objects with other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objects, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método combinar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> tipo de objetos de idênticos, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos com outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objetos com outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objetos e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos ou esse método retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on an MDI child form, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: Se houver duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controles em um formulário MDI filho, definindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> para `true` pai formulário mescla o conteúdo de apenas uma o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controles.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> to merge the contents of additional child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> para mesclar o conteúdo de filho adicional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controles no formulário pai MDI.

trans-unit.source: The following code example merges menu items based on specified choices.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mescla os itens de menu com base nas opções especificadas.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default painting styles for the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o padrão de estilos de pintura para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A> property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode.ManagerRenderMode>.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A> propriedade é usada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode.ManagerRenderMode>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to apply a custom professional renderer to an individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or to the application as a whole.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como aplicar um renderizador professional personalizado a um indivíduo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> ou para o aplicativo como um todo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: To prevent memory leaks, disable this event when your application is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar perdas de memória, desabilite esse evento quando seu aplicativo é descartado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RendererChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> named `ToolStripManager1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> chamado `ToolStripManager1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RendererChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default theme for the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tema padrão para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A> property to get or set whether the application is painted by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>, or a customized <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A> propriedade para obter ou definir se o aplicativo é pintado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>, ou um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um uso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The set value was not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor definido não era um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode.Custom" />; use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer" /> property instead.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode" /> está definido como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode.Custom" />; use a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer" /> em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: Undoes a merging of two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Desfaz uma mesclagem de dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> for which to undo a merge operation.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> para o qual desfazer uma operação de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: Undoes a merging of two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects, returning the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> with the specified name to its state before the merge and nullifying all previous merge operations.
trans-unit.target: Desfaz uma mesclagem de dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, retornando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> com o nome especificado para seu estado antes da mesclagem e anulando todas as operações de mesclagem anteriores.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the undoing of the merge is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a operação de desfazer a mesclagem for bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos ou esse método retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> for which to undo a merge operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> para o qual desfazer uma operação de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: Undoes a merging of two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects, returning the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to its state before the merge and nullifying all previous merge operations.
trans-unit.target: Desfaz uma mesclagem de dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, retornando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> especificado para seu estado antes da mesclagem e anulando todas as operações de mesclagem anteriores.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the undoing of the merge is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a operação de desfazer a mesclagem for bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos ou esse método retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example undoes the merging of menu items.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir desfaz a mesclagem de itens de menu.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> for which to undo a merge operation.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> para o qual desfazer uma operação de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that was merged with the <c>targetToolStrip</c>.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> que foi mesclado com o <c>targetToolStrip</c>.

trans-unit.source: Undoes a merging of two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects, returning both <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> controls to their state before the merge and nullifying all previous merge operations.
trans-unit.target: Desfaz uma mesclagem de dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, retornando ambos os controles <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> para seu estado antes da mesclagem e anulando todas as operações de mesclagem anteriores.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the undoing of the merge is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a operação de desfazer a mesclagem for bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos ou esse método retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceToolStrip" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="sourceToolStrip" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Saves settings for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
trans-unit.target: Salva as configurações para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> whose name is also the settings key.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> cujo nome também é a chave de configurações.

trans-unit.source: Saves settings for the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> using the full name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> as the settings key.
trans-unit.target: Salva as configurações para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> especificado usando o nome completo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> como a chave de configurações.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls that are not on the form at design time when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> settings are saved are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> when the settings are loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles que não estão no formulário no design de hora em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> configurações são salvas são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> quando as configurações são carregadas.

trans-unit.source: To reset the settings, comment out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line and leave the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> line.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir as configurações, comente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> de linha e deixe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> linha.

trans-unit.source: This will not load any settings and will persist the last state.
trans-unit.target: Isso não carregará as configurações e será mantido o último estado.

trans-unit.source: When you remove the comment from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line, those settings will be applied.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover o comentário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> linha, essas configurações serão aplicadas.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceForm" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="sourceForm" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> for which to save settings.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> para o qual salvar as configurações.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the settings key for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa a chave de configurações para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.

trans-unit.source: Saves settings for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> using the specified settings key.
trans-unit.target: Salva as configurações para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> especificado usando a chave de configurações especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls that are not on the form at design time when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> settings are saved are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> when the settings are loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles que não estão no formulário no design de hora em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> configurações são salvas são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> quando as configurações são carregadas.

trans-unit.source: To reset the settings, comment out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line and leave the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> line.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir as configurações, comente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> de linha e deixe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> linha.

trans-unit.source: This will not load any settings and will persist the last state.
trans-unit.target: Isso não carregará as configurações e será mantido o último estado.

trans-unit.source: When you remove the comment from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line, those settings will be applied.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover o comentário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> linha, essas configurações serão aplicadas.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" /> ou está vazio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is rendered using visual style information called themes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> é renderizado usando as informações de estilo visual chamadas temas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is rendered using themes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> renderizado usando temas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
